name: 2023 International Conference on Mechatronics, Control and Robotics
content: Publication: Papers submitted to ICMCR 2023 will be peer reviewed by the international program committees, accepted papers will be published in the ICMCR 2023 conference proceedings, which will be included into IEEE Xplore and submitted to major databases like EI Compendex, Scopus, etc for indexing. A few selected papers will be recommended to International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research for possible publication after being extended, which will be indexed by Scopus,CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
